Uses of Class
modele.occupant.Occupant

  • Packages that use Occupant 
    Package Description
    modele  
    modele.occupant.objetFixe  
    modele.occupant.objetMobile  

    • Uses of Occupant in modele

      Methods in modele that return Occupant 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Occupant Grille.getTresor() 
      Methods in modele that return types with arguments of type Occupant 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<Position,java.util.List<Occupant>> Grille.getMap() 
      java.util.List<Occupant> Grille.getPos(Position p)
      This function returns a list of occupants at a given position if it exists in a map, otherwise it returns null.
      Methods in modele with parameters of type Occupant 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Grille.addOccupant(Position p, Occupant o)
      This function adds an occupant to a position in a map, creating a new list if the position is not already in the map.
      int Grille.removeOccupant(Position p, Occupant o)
      This Java function removes an occupant from a position in a map if it exists and returns 1, otherwise it returns 0.
      void Grille.setTresor(Occupant tresor) 

    • Uses of Occupant in modele.occupant.objetFixe

      Subclasses of Occupant in modele.occupant.objetFixe 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Border
      The Border class processes the movement of a mobile object and redirects it if it encounters a border in a grid.
      class  Carte
      The Carte class is a subclass of ObjetFixe that redirects Hunters towards the treasure and randomizes the direction of other mobile objects.
      class  Glue
      The "Glue" class is a subclass of "ObjetFixe" that represents a stationary object on a grid with a waiting time for mobile objects that come into contact with it.
      class  ObjetFixe 
      class  Pierre
      The Pierre class extends the ObjetFixe class and contains methods for checking if a position contains a Pierre, an ObjetMobile, or an ObjetFixe, as well as a process method for handling the movement of an ObjetMobile on the grid.
      class  Tool
      The "Tool" class is a subclass of "ObjetFixe" that updates the position of a mobile object, adds it to the grid, and sets a flag indicating that it has a tool.
      class  Tresor
      The "Tresor" class updates the position of a mobile object on a grid and sets a flag indicating if it has reached its destination.
      Methods in modele.occupant.objetFixe that return Occupant 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Occupant Pierre.containObjetFixe(Position p, Grille m)
      This Java function checks if a given position in a grid contains a fixed object and returns it if it does.
      Occupant Pierre.containObjetMobile(Position p, Grille m)
      This Java function checks if a mobile object is present at a given position in a grid and returns the object if found.

    • Uses of Occupant in modele.occupant.objetMobile

      Subclasses of Occupant in modele.occupant.objetMobile 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Cheater
      The "Cheater" class redirects a mobile object towards the opposite direction of a treasure on a grid.
      class  Hunter
      The Hunter class extends the ObjetMobile class and has a process method that redirects other mobile objects to a random direction.
      class  ObjetMobile
      The ObjetMobile class is an abstract class that represents a mobile object in a grid, with attributes such as waiting time, direction, and tool possession.
      class  Sage
      The `Sage` class is a subclass of `ObjetMobile` that has a `process` method which redirects non-hunter objects to a random direction and calculates the direction for a hunter object towards the treasure.
      Methods in modele.occupant.objetMobile that return Occupant 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Occupant ObjetMobile.getObjetMobile(Position p, Grille m)
      This Java function returns an instance of an ObjetMobile if it exists at a given position in a Grille object.
